attributes.action: Make all forms of sexual harresment a crime
attributes.additional_details: We can’t keep brushing these situations and experiences under the carpet. I have experienced sexual harrasment countless times by colleagues, bosses, clients, friends, strangers. What can I really do about it? I’ve tried reporting it in the past but was made to feel as though I was over exaggerating. This should not be how we are made to feel! Sexual harrasment should not be accepted and tolerated! It had to end!
attributes.background: There a many petitions I’ve found about making public/ street sexual Harrasment a crime. But sexual harrasment full stop should be a crime. Including social media, texts, family and work place.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578940
